caption: Nice looking place. Beautiful bar, and friendly service. We had a 14" green with envy, an 18" cheese with black olives, and an 8 piece vegan wings. $58 with tip. The crust was bland and dry. Highlights were the pesto and buffalo sauces. The vegan wings were very dry and overcooked
I had a craving for wings and I went here after work and ordered 8 piece bone-in spicy hoisin wings and they were over cooked and burnt disappointed!!!!
You got to try their chicken wings So yummy 😋 Also their cauliflower pizza crust is so good 😊 I love this place, give it a shot and you will not regret!
Extreme pizza just opened up on Barracks row. Extreme nice and hospitable staff (no pun intended, great options, and very affordable prices for the area. Definitely going back often

I was reared on pizza, in a small Italian American town in Pennsylvania and also in NYC and its boroughs.  This means I have an immutable opinion on what means to be a good pizza, and I share it, often.  I also am a Barracks Row neighbor, excited to welcome new friends.  I visited Extreme Pizza Barracks Row Saturday afternoon, 2/27/21.  I was impressed by their conscientious Covid protocol; their courteous, friendly, efficient, and unfussy/family-friendly customer service; and the quality and pricing of their basic cheese pizza (I told you, there is only one pizza for me!).  The crust was a tad bit thicker than that of a NYC pizza, but it was yummy and cooked perfectly; and the ratio of crust, sauce, and cheese was perfect, and each component was fresh and tasty.  This definitely will be one of my only two go-to DMV pizza joints!  My only suggesed upgrades (I am a  New York expat, and a dog nut), first, if you do not already do so -- and I figure you do -- make sure to welcome well-behaved puppy family members to the patio, and second, put out a water bowl for your passerby neighbor pups.  Again, welcome to the neighborhood!
This is best pizza i ever had .

Beware, they are not ready for orders! Ordered at  4:40pm for 6:45pm pickup. Went in and was told repeatedly it would only be a few more minutes. 40 minutes later they said they hadn’t even started it! Maybe will try again in a few months.

I went to their soft opening, so they warned me that I might have to be patient with the new workers. But I actually had a really good experience: quick service, tasty food, friendly employees (not a given in the District!). As a vegetarian, I appreciated the substantial vegetarian menu, and I am excited to try the vegan wings. I'm looking forward to going back!
